text: The men's quadruple sculls competition at the 2019 World Rowing Championships took place at the Linz-Ottensheim regatta venue. A top-eight finish ensured qualification for the Tokyo Olympics. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | Sunday 25 August 2019 || 12:36 || Heats |- | Tuesday 27 August 2019 || 10:42 || Repechages |- | Thursday 29 August 2019 || 12:42 || Semifinals A/B |- | rowspan=3|Saturday 31 August 2019 || 10:35 || Final C |- | 12:36 || Final B |- | style=background:lemonchiffon| 15:30 ||style=background:lemonchiffon| Final A |} All times are Central European Summer Time (UTC+2) ==Results== ===Heats=== The two fastest boats in each heat advanced directly to the A/B semifinals. The remaining boats were sent to the repechages. ====Heat 1==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|Hamish Playfair The three fastest boats in each repechage advanced to the A/B semifinals. The remaining boats were sent to the C final. ====Repechage 1==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|Erik Solbakken Martin Helseth Jan Helvig Olaf Tufte | align="left"| | 5:47.08 | SA/B |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 2 | align="left"|Kaur Kuslap Allar Raja Tõnu Endrekson Kaspar Taimsoo | align="left"| | 5:48.93 | SA/B |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 3 | align="left"|Yi Xudi Zang Ha Liu Dang Zhang Quan | align="left"| | 5:50.93 | SA/B |- | 4 | align="left"|Thomas Lehner Armin Auerbach Julian Brabec Joerg Auerbach | align="left"| | 5:53.83 | FC |- | 5 | align="left"|Žygimantas Gališanskis Rolandas Maščinskas Dominykas Jančionis Aurimas Adomavičius | align="left"| | 6:05.46 | FC |} ====Repechage 2==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|Jonathan Walton Angus Groom Jack Beaumont Peter Lambert | align="left"| | 5:45.41 | SA/B |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 2 | align="left"|Nathan Flannery Lewis Hollows Cameron Crampton Jordan Parry | align="left"| | 5:47.13 | SA/B |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 3 | align="left"|Dmytro Mikhay Serhiy Hryn Oleksandr Nadtoka Ivan Dovhodko | align="left"| | 5:47.54 | SA/B |- | 4 | align="left"|John Graves Gregory Ansolabehere Tristan Amberger Michael Knippen | align="left"| | 5:48.80 | FC |- | 5 | align="left"|Thibaud Turlan Guillaume Turlan Stanislas Desgrippes Maxime Ducret | align="left"| | 5:52.64 | FC |- | 6 | align="left"|Alexandru Maşnic Alexandr Bulat Ivan Corșunov Chirill Visotchi-Sestacov | align="left"| | 5:58.27 | FC |} ===Semifinals=== The three fastest boats in each semi advanced to the A final. The remaining boats were sent to the B final. ====Semifinal 1==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|Filippo Mondelli Andrea Panizza Luca Rambaldi Giacomo Gentili | align="left"| | 5:33.22 | FA |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 2 | align="left"|Dominik Czaja Wiktor Chabel Szymon Pośnik Fabian Barański | align="left"| | 5:34.08 | FA |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 3 | align="left"|Hamish Playfair Campbell Watts Cameron Girdlestone David Watts | align="left"| | 5:36.61 | FA |- | 4 | align="left"|Jonathan Walton Angus Groom Jack Beaumont Peter Lambert | align="left"| | 5:39.86 | FB |- | 5 | align="left"|Dmytro Mikhay Serhiy Hryn Oleksandr Nadtoka Ivan Dovhodko | align="left"| | 5:42.97 | FB |- | 6 | align="left"|Kaur Kuslap Allar Raja Tõnu Endrekson Kaspar Taimsoo | align="left"| | 5:43.68 | FB |} ====Semifinal 2==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|Dirk Uittenbogaard Abe Wiersma Tone Wieten Koen Metsemakers | align="left"| | 5:33.59 | FA |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 2 | align="left"|Karl Schulze Timo Piontek Max Appel Hans Gruhne | align="left"| | 5:36.61 | FA |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 3 | align="left"|Yi Xudi Zang Ha Liu Dang Zhang Quan | align="left"| | 5:37.96 | FA |- | 4 | align="left"|Erik Solbakken Martin Helseth Jan Helvig Olaf Tufte | align="left"| | 5:38.27 | FB |- | 5 | align="left"|Nathan Flannery Lewis Hollows Cameron Crampton Jordan Parry | align="left"| | 5:42.79 | FB |- | 6 | align="left"|Ilya Kondratyev Artyom Kosov Nikolay Pimenov Pavel Sorin | align="left"| | 5:43.29 | FB |} ===Finals=== The A final determined the rankings for places 1 to 6.
